title: Earning Her Stripes: Book 1 of the Brother Tigers MC
description: Griffin Verlaine is totally unprepared for the turbulence that enters his life when he comes to the rescue of a damsel in distress the same day he is released from prison. Ideal McCrae is no damsel in distress but accepting help when she finds herself in a tight spot sets her down a path with all kinds of challenges along the way. Getting tangled up with the President of a motorcycle gang was not in the plan, and Ideal finds herself tested again and again. How hard can two people fight to get what they want when it feels like the whole world is against them being together? Ideal and Griffin are about to find out exactly what it takes.  Earning Her Strips contains sexually explicit scenes, bad language/cursing, and descriptions of violence. Intended for readers 18 years plus.  This is a full-length novel of around 99,000 words.
author: Tabitha Wildmoor
